name: Ballonimal
description:
Ballonimal is a Point and Click type minigame, where your objective is to save the little animals from the balloons so that they don't reach space. 

Help them get down!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: Left Click

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game have been created for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 238

Software:

Art: FireAlpaca / Photoshop

Coding: Unity Bolt

Social Networks: (Instagram, Youtube, Twitter)
